'''Radiant Spincrystal 46''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Sojourner's Sweet Dream (Wangshu Night)|Sojourner's Sweet Dream]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It has a chance to be sold by the [[Teapot Traveling Salesman]].
